timeline.message:
Issue #1041, Issue #1042 - IG fixes / improvements

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

Issue #1042 - updated FHIRValidationGuide.md

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Is it any different then our other IndexGenerators?  I'm wondering if this utility should be move to the base instead of copied to each IG.
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: Or, if you keep a separate copy in each ig module, maybe move them to src/test/java so they don't go in the actual jar.
replies.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: I don't think it should go in tests. I will investigate making it a utility but there isn't a great place for it to go because it is reading from the local file system and anything outside of the project will lead to some wonky path resolution (though I'm sure it's doable).
replies.author: JohnTimm

timeline.bodyText: I know its not a test, but maybe we should move it to src/test/java so that its not included in the actual Jar
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: If we update the artifacts in the future, then I think it makes sense to keep it in the main src folder tree because we will run it again and it seems more like main code than test code in that regard.
replies.author: JohnTimm

timeline.message:
Issue #1041, Issue #1042 - minor tweaks

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>
Merge branch 'johntimm-master' of https://github.com/IBM/FHIR into johntimm-master

timeline.bodyText: pretty minor, but i'd have prefered PlanNetResourceProvider
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: I'm happy to acquiesce to your naming preferences.
replies.author: JohnTimm
